0: Very clean big room standard good free breakfast refrigerator in the room plenty of covered parking
Would highly recommend this hotel better value than the ones closest to Forest Park
The area is close to Forest Park Downtown etc
Room was very large breakfast was great and plentiful hotel was easy to find lots to do around Forest Park and Galleria
Parking was plentiful in the free parking garage steps from the hotel
Free parking in a ramp close by and a very friendly staff
The hotel was very easy to find right off the highway and had it is own parking garage
Close to museums a park and restaurants
It was easy to get in and out of parking garage when leaving for lunch and dinner
1: I usually stay here whenever I bring or visit my child at school not sure I will next time the room price and new parking fee more than what I want to pay Staff around the food were rude
However we were given a free parking pass because of having to wait
Not sure why they charge for parking when the sign says free parking
The only negative we could possibly note is the entrance closest to the parking garage has a key reader that needs replaced
2 issues within a wek cleaning people left my door open noise from an idling truck parked next to the side of the hotel all evening and still thereYes management notified each time
There was some issue with parking fees not reflecting in my booking but they adjusted the final bill without any issue
Having to pay 10 to park was another unhappy surprise
To park in Free spots it was 100
The only negative feedback about my stay is that you have to pay for parking at the hotel
If I had a rental car this would be a perfectly serviceable property
